response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and I am pleased to extend this exclusive offer to you at a carefully considered price of $1,100,000. This offer represents an exceptional opportunity for you to secure a piece of unparalleled quality at a highly competitive rate. I trust this proposal will be favorable to you, and I look forward to discussing the details further. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you in every way possible.", "product_price": 1100000}
